channel.title: cshotton tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from cshotton.

item.description: @b05crypto The worshipers of White American Baby Jesus do not care what you think, heathen. /s
item.source:markdown: @b05crypto The worshipers of White American Baby Jesus do not care what you think, heathen. /s

item.description: @rudytheelder Well, that's a good point. But you probably wouldn't be wrong to just sprinkle a few more red-shifted galaxies in there.
item.source:markdown: @rudytheelder Well, that's a good point. But you probably wouldn't be wrong to just sprinkle a few more red-shifted galaxies in there.

item.description: @rudytheelder And here I was thinking that someone was just adding cheesy Photoshop filters to make the stars look fancy. Seems like they could remove those with a little software work...
item.source:markdown: @rudytheelder And here I was thinking that someone was just adding cheesy Photoshop filters to make the stars look fancy. Seems like they could remove those with a little software work...

item.description: @siegel LOL! I thought you meant that Minecraft guy.
item.source:markdown: @siegel LOL! I thought you meant that Minecraft guy.

item.description: @sauldraws Usually, too much salt in brownies gives them that "Play-Doh" flavor (which I find... unappealing). In fact, you shouldn't even use salted butter in brownies to avoid that. Saul, are you telling us you like to eat Play-Doh....?
item.source:markdown: @sauldraws Usually, too much salt in brownies gives them that "Play-Doh" flavor (which I find... unappealing). In fact, you shouldn't even use salted butter in brownies to avoid that. Saul, are you telling us you like to eat Play-Doh....?

item.description: @rudytheelder Would be interesting for their thought processes to happen at vastly different speeds, or perhaps she's schizophrenic because her personality bubbles up from places light years apart.
item.source:markdown: @rudytheelder Would be interesting for their thought processes to happen at vastly different speeds, or perhaps she's schizophrenic because her personality bubbles up from places light years apart.

item.description: @willie I mean, is that even a fair question? C is probably the only language that you'll have universal runtime support for across all the different platforms. You can't assume the rest would even work stand-alone, much less linked into another app.
item.source:markdown: @willie I mean, is that even a fair question? C is probably the only language that you'll have universal runtime support for across all the different platforms. You can't assume the rest would even work stand-alone, much less linked into another app.
